Lorem Ipsum has been the industry\'s standard dummy text ever since the 1500s, when an unknown printer took a galley of type and scrambled it to make a type specimen book. It has survived not only five centuries, but also the leap into electronic typesetting, remaining essentially unchanged. Why do we use it?It is a long established fact that a reader will be distracted by the readable content of a page when looking at its layout. The point of using Lorem Ipsum is that it has a more-or-less normal distribution of letters, as opposed to using \'Content here, content here\', making it look like readable English. If you\'re referring to the terms and conditions, legal disclaimers, or any other specific text that appears in Zomato\'s bottom sheet, I recommend checking directly within the Zomato app or contacting their customer support for accurate information. If you have a specific idea of what you want to convey in that section of the bottom sheet, you could create a custom message that outlines the purpose of collecting PAN details, any legal requirements, and how the information will be used. However, it\'s essential to ensure that the text complies with legal regulations and accurately represents the terms and conditions of PAN collection and usage.
